item.title: My first Java!
item.dc:creator: @n00bkill n00bkill
item.description:
@n00bkill wrote:

[code]
//the shoe thing, was just cause i was bored lol
import java.util.*;

public class UserInput
{
public static void main(String[] args)
{
int intInput;
String stringInput;
float floatInput;

		Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);

		System.out.print("What is your name?");
		stringInput = input.nextLine();

		System.out.print("What is your age?");
		intInput = input.nextInt();

		System.out.print("What is your shoe-size?");
		floatInput = input.nextFloat();

		input.close();

		System.out.print("Hello " + stringInput +
							". You are " + intInput + " years old, and wear a size " + floatInput + " shoe\n");
}

}[/code]

haha coolest thing ever!
